name: Down for the kiwi
description:
“When I was 11 years old, we moved to Reykjavik. This is a great place without the mosquitoes and angry neighbors. I really liked my new house. 

Once my mother got a letter. It turned out to be from my grandmother. She had said hello and send me her grappling hook and an interesting fruit. Mom explained me that it’s called kiwi. Tasty! I want more, but my grandmother lives on the other side of the planet!

Maybe I should dig a tunnel...”

move-arrows (hold down), 

sand disappears from touch, 

earth (maroon) - you need to dig(arrow + left mouse button), 

stones are stones)))

time is limited. It is replenished at the stations. you need to pass 5 stations for Kiwi)
